errors.GEOLOCATION_NOT_SUPPORTED: Geolocation does not seem to be supported on your device or browser.
errors.GEOLOCATION_ERROR: We are not able to locate your position, this might affect some features of the application.
errors.GEOLOCATION_PERMISSION_DENIED: @:errors.GEOLOCATION_ERROR It seems you did not give permission to locate you.
errors.GEOLOCATION_POSITION_UNAVAILABLE: @:errors.GEOLOCATION_ERROR It seems the internal source of position returned an internal error.
errors.GEOLOCATION_POSITION_TIMEOUT: @:errors.GEOLOCATION_ERROR It seems the time allowed to acquire it was reached before the information was obtained.
errors.ALERTS_LIMIT: Too much alerts to display all of them
errors.CANNOT_CHECK_ALERT_MISSING_SERVICE: Last check failed due to unavailable service
errors.CANNOT_CHECK_ALERT_MISSING_DATA: Last check failed due to unavailable data
errors.INVALID_GEOJSON_FILE: {file} is not a valid GeoJSON file
errors.INVALID_GEOJSON_CRS: {file} has an unsupported Coordinates Reference System (CRS)
errors.INVALID_GPX_FILE: {file} is not a valid GPX file
errors.INVALID_KML_FILE: {file} is not a valid KML file
errors.GEOMETRY_TOO_FEW_POINTS: {total} errors of too few distinct points in geometry component

layers.INVALID_FEATURES_DIALOG_MESSAGE: Your layer contains {total} elements with invalid geometry. As a consequence they will be removed prior to saving.
layers.INVALID_FEATURES_LIST_ERRORS:
Liste des erreurs :
    {errors}
layers.SAVING_LABEL: Please wait while saving layer data,</br>processed {processed} over {total} features
layers.SAVE_DIALOG_MESSAGE: Your layer contains too much elements and has been optimized to be smoothly displayed.</br>As a consequence, it will only be visible at a local scale from a given zoom level.
layers.REMOVING_LABEL: Please wait while removing layer data
layers.REMOVE_DIALOG_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to remove {layer} from your workspace ?

gesture.TOUCH: Use two fingers to move the map
gesture.SCROLL: Use Ctrl + scroll to zoom the map
gesture.SCROLL_MAC: Use ⌘ + scroll to zoom the map
gesture.CTRL: Use Ctrl + scroll to zoom the map

tooltip.start: Click and drag to draw circle.
Click map to place circle marker.

tooltip.end: Click first point to close this shape.
Click last point to finish line.

tooltip.start: Click and drag to draw rectangle.

tooltip.text: Drag handles or markers to edit features.
Click on a feature to remove.

geolocation.TITLE: My position
geolocation.POPUP: You are within {'{distance}'} {'{unit}'} from this point
geolocation.OUTSIDE_MAP_BOUNDS: You seem located outside the boundaries of the map

schemas.CATALOG_NAME_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the name of the new layer
schemas.CATALOG_DESCRIPTION_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the description of the new layer
schemas.CATALOG_FEATURE_ID_FIELD_LABEL: Enter a unique feature ID property name
schemas.CATALOG_FEATURE_LABEL_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the feature label property name
schemas.LAYER_CATEGORY_NAME_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the name of this category
schemas.LAYER_CATEGORY_ICON_FIELD_LABEL: Select an icon for this category
schemas.LAYER_CATEGORY_LAYERS_FIELD_LABEL: Select the layers in this category
schemas.LAYER_CATEGORY_EXCLUSIVE_FIELD_LABEL: Make selection exclusive within this category
schemas.PROJECT_NAME_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the name of this project
schemas.PROJECT_DESCRIPTION_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the description of this project
schemas.PROJECT_LAYERS_FIELD_LABEL: Select the layers in this project
schemas.PROJECT_VIEWS_FIELD_LABEL: Select the views in this project
schemas.PROJECT_INDENTIFIER_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the identifier of this project for third-party applications

navigation-bar.NAVIGATION_BAR_LABEL: This bar allows to quickly execute recurring actions on the map.
navigation-bar.TOGGLE_MAP_LABEL: Switch to 2D map view using this button.
navigation-bar.TOGGLE_GLOBE_LABEL: Switch to 3D map view using this button.
navigation-bar.GEOLOCATE_LABEL: Recenter the map on your location and display it using this button.
navigation-bar.SEARCH_LOCATION_LABEL: Seek for an address using this button.
navigation-bar.LOCATION_SEARCHING_LABEL: Type part of your address and select among the proposed locations to center the map on.
navigation-bar.LOCATION_BACK_LABEL: Close the coordinates widget by clicking this button.
navigation-bar.SEARCH_BACK_LABEL: Then stop searching by going back to the actions.
navigation-bar.TOOLS_LABEL: Select among available tools using this button.
navigation-bar.TRACK_LOCATION_LABEL: Display the coordinates of a location using this button.
navigation-bar.COPY_LOCATION_LABEL: Copy the coordinates in your clipboard using this button.
navigation-bar.LOCATION_TRACKING_LABEL: Drag the screen to display the coordinates of its center and release to keep track of it.
navigation-bar.TRACK_BACK_LABEL: Then stop tracking by going back to the actions.
navigation-bar.MEASURE_LABEL: Activate measure tools using this button.
navigation-bar.MEASURE_DISTANCE_LABEL: Measure a distance using this button.
navigation-bar.MEASURE_DISTANCE_DETAILS_LABEL: Draw the line segment(s) you'd like to measure on the map and hover any elements to get measure information.
navigation-bar.MEASURE_AREA_LABEL: Measure an area using this button.
navigation-bar.MEASURE_AREA_DETAILS_LABEL: Draw the polygons(s) you'd like to measure on the map and hover any elements to get measure information.
navigation-bar.MEASURE_CIRCLE_LABEL: Measure an isodistance using this button.
navigation-bar.MEASURE_CIRCLE_DETAILS_LABEL: Draw the circle(s) you'd like to measure on the map and hover any elements to get measure information.
navigation-bar.MEASURE_FEATURE_LABEL: Measure a geographical feature using this button.
navigation-bar.MEASURE_FEATURE_DETAILS_LABEL: Select the feature you'd like to measure on the map to get measure information.
navigation-bar.PRINT_MAP_LABEL: Print the view using this button.
navigation-bar.CAPTURE_BUTTON_LABEL: Capture and download the view using this button.
navigation-bar.CAPTURE_BACK_LABEL: Then stop capturing by going back to the actions.
navigation-bar.CLEAR_MEASURE_LABEL: Clear your current measurements using this button.
navigation-bar.MEASURE_BACK_LABEL: Then stop measuring by going back to the actions.
navigation-bar.TOGGLE_VR_LABEL: Switch to Virtual Reality (VR) mode with this button.
navigation-bar.TOGGLE_FULLSCREEN_LABEL: Switch to fullscreen mode with this button.
navigation-bar.TOGGLE_CATALOG_LABEL: Open the catalog with this button.
navigation-bar.NORTH_ARROW_LABEL: Display or hide the north arrow using this button.

catalog-panel.CATALOG_LABEL:
The catalog allows to manage data displayed on your map.
The catalogd is divided into 3 different tabs.
catalog-panel.USER_LAYERS_LABEL: Your data space. You can import data files, connect to a map server or create a new dataset.
catalog-panel.CATEGORIES_LABEL: The data are organised into different categories.
catalog-panel.USER_VIEWS_LABEL: Your favorite views.</br>The views allow you to position yourself at defined places while activating some data layers.
catalog-panel.USER_VIEWS_VIEW_LABEL: Click on the view to update the map.
catalog-panel.USER_VIEWS_SET_HOME_LABEL: Set this view as the default view
catalog-panel.CATEGORY_LABEL: Select a category to list all available data layers.
catalog-panel.SHOW_LAYER_LABEL: Select a layer to show it on the map, it will then be highlighted in the list.
catalog-panel.MIN_LEVEL_LABEL: When a layer is not visible according to your scale it will be disabled, you must zoom in to make it show on the map.
catalog-panel.HIDE_LAYER_LABEL: A new selection will hide it.
catalog-panel.METEO_MODEL_LABEL: Regarding meteorological data you can also switch the prediction model if multiple are available.
catalog-panel.METEO_LAYERS_LABEL: Each layer will then target data of a specific meteorological element from this model.
catalog-panel.MANAGE_LAYER_CATEGORIES_LABEL: You can manage the categories of your own data layers.
catalog-panel.CATEGORIES_LIST_LABEL: When you have defined some categories they are listed here, otherwise you can directly create your first one.
catalog-panel.CATEGORIES_LIST_ACTIONS_LABEL: Sort your categories by name or update time and seek for a target one.
catalog-panel.CATEGORY_ACTIONS_LABEL: Update or remove a category by using these buttons.
catalog-panel.ADD_CATEGORY_LABEL: Add a new category using this button.
catalog-panel.LAYER_CATEGORY_NAME_LABEL: Enter the name of your new category.
catalog-panel.LAYER_CATEGORY_ICON_LABEL: Enter the icon of your new category.
catalog-panel.LAYER_CATEGORY_LAYERS_LABEL: Select the layers to be part of this category.
catalog-panel.LAYER_CATEGORY_EXCLUSIVE_LABEL: Set if only one layer should be visible at a time in this category.
catalog-panel.CREATE_NEW_LAYER_CATEGORY_LABEL: Confirm the creation of your new category in the catalog.

timeline.TIMELINE_LABEL: The timeline allows to quickly execute actions related to the time of displayed data.
timeline.DATE_LABEL: Jump to any given date by using this button.
timeline.NOW_LABEL: Activate to real-time using this button.
timeline.NEXT_STEP_LABEL: Go forward in time to the next step as configured.
timeline.PREVIOUS_STEP_LABEL: Go backward in time to the previous step as configured.
timeline.NEXT_HOUR_LABEL: Go forward in time to the next hour.
timeline.PREVIOUS_HOUR_LABEL: Go backward in time to the previous hour.
timeline.NEXT_DAY_LABEL: Go forward in time to the next day.
timeline.PREVIOUS_DAY_LABEL: Go backward in time to the previous day.

fab.PROBE_LABEL: Probe weather forecast data at a specific location.
fab.PROBE_CURSOR_LABEL: After selecting this option click on a target location on the map to display related forecast data.
fab.ADD_LAYER_LINK_LABEL: How to add a new data layer
fab.CREATE_VIEW_LABEL: Add a new views using this button.
fab.CREATE_VIEW_LINK_LABEL: How to create a new view

add-layer.ADD_LAYER_LINK_LABEL: How to add others types of data layers
add-layer.FILE_LABEL: Select your data file in GeoJSON format.
add-layer.SERVICE_LABEL: Enter the URL of the GetCapabilities request for the target OGC service.
add-layer.SERVICE_LAYER_LABEL: Select the target OGC service layer to connect to.
add-layer.LAYER_NAME_LABEL: Enter the name of your new data layer.
add-layer.LAYER_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Then provide a description for your new data layer.
add-layer.LAYER_FEATURE_ID_LABEL: Last, choose an identifier to uniquely identify the features of your layer.
add-layer.LAYER_STYLE_LABEL: Select the style to be used for your layer.
add-layer.LAYER_SCHEMA_LABEL: Select the data schema of your features (JSON schema file).
add-layer.IMPORT_LAYER_LABEL: Import existing data as a new data layer.
add-layer.IMPORT_NEW_LAYER_LABEL: Confirm the creation of your new layer and the map will be centered on your new layer.
add-layer.CONNECT_LAYER_LABEL: Connect your layer to a remote OGC service (WMS, WFS, WMTS, TMS).
add-layer.CONNECT_NEW_LAYER_LABEL: Confirm the creation of your new layer.
add-layer.CREATE_LAYER_LABEL: Create a new blank data layer based on a data schema.
add-layer.CREATE_LAYER_LINK_LABEL: How to create a new data layer
add-layer.CREATE_NEW_LAYER_LABEL: Confirm the creation of your new layer and start editing the data on the map.

create-view.NAME_FIELD_LABEL: Saisissez un nom pour votre nouvelle vue
create-view.DESCRIPTION_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the name of your new view.
create-view.LAYERS_FIELD_LABEL: Select whether the currently active layers will be restaured with this view or not.
create-view.APPLY_BUTTON_LABEL: Confirm the creation of your new favorite view.

side-nav.CONTEXT_HELP_LABEL: To get contextual help whenever your are lost simply click on the following icon
side-nav.ABOUT_LABEL: Display detailed system information and send us bug reports.
side-nav.BUG_LABEL: Send us a bug report with a preformatted email containing required information.
side-nav.SETTINGS_LABEL: Update general settings of the system on your device.
side-nav.LOGOUT_LABEL: Logout in order to close your work session.
side-nav.SESSION_LABEL: Otherwise the session will remain active on your device for 24H, you will not have to login again in this time frame.

KOwsServiceField.WFS_MISSING_GEOJSON_SUPPORT: The WFS service has no support for GeoJSON, which is required.
KOwsServiceField.UNAUTHORIZED_MESSAGE: You do not seem to be authorized to access this service, you might need to add an API key in the request header.

KOwsLayerField.UNSUPPORTED_LAYER_CRS: The projection used by this layer is not supported.
KOwsLayerField.UNSUPPORTED_LAYER_FORMAT: The data format used by this layer is not supported.

KLocationSearch.ENABLE_VIEWBOX: Activate search limitation to the current view
KLocationSearch.DISABLE_VIEWBOX: Deactivate search limitation to the current view

KPositionIndicator.CANNOT_COPY_POSITION: Unable to copy the position to clipboard. Your browser does not support this functionality

KTimeSeries.LABEL: Time Series
KTimeSeries.CENTER_ON: Center the view on the probed location

KViewsPanel.UNCACHING_VIEW: Data removal for view in progress
KViewsPanel.REMOVE_DIALOG_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to remove {view} from your workspace ?

KCreateOfflineView.MIN_ZOOM_FIELD_LABEL: Zoom level from which data will be downloaded, increase will reduce data size
KCreateOfflineView.MAX_ZOOM_FIELD_LABEL: Zoom level until which data will be downloaded, increase will increase data size
KCreateOfflineView.NB_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS_FIELD_LABEL: Number of concurrent requests issued to download, increase will speed up download but load the device and the server
KCreateOfflineView.NUMBER_OF_TILES: Estimated number of tiles to download per layer:

KProjectsPanel.REMOVE_DIALOG_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to remove {project} from your workspace ?

KProjectEditor.BACKGROUND_LAYER_REQUIRED: A project at least requires a background layer.

KFeaturesFilterManager.STYLE_LABEL: Select a style for this filter

KFeaturesChart.SELECT_PROPERTY_LABEL: Select a target property to start
KFeaturesChart.TITLE: Graphs for layer

KSelectedLayerFeatures.REMOVE_FEATURE_DIALOG_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to remove this feature from your workspace ?
KSelectedLayerFeatures.REMOVE_FEATURES_DIALOG_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to remove these features from your workspace ?
